name: Glimmer Cape
description: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.

abilities.name: Glimmer
abilities.description: Applies a buff that periodically turns the target invisible and phased over the duration, even if the invisibility gets broken.
notes: Does not interrupt the wielder's channeling abilities
The caster does not require to face the target in order to cast it on them
Can only be cast on heroes, including illusions and creep-heroes
Recasting the ability refreshes the buff duration
Does not grant the target phased movement
Attacking or casting abilities or items during the fade delay resets the fade delay
Picking up, dropping, or selling items does not break the invisibility
Reaching the cast point of abilities or items breaks invisibility
Reaching the attack point of an attack breaks invisibility
Grants the target a magical damage barrier for the whole duration
Depleting the barrier does not prematurely end the ability
Increases the target's movement speed during the invisibility phases, but not during the fade delay
Does not share cooldowns with Glimmer Cape

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally
Stacks multiplicatively with other magic resistance sources
Increases most heroes' magic resistance to 40%
With the magic resistance bonus from this source, every 10 points of intelligence further increases the total magic resistance by 0.8%
